com.netflix.nicobar.core.persistence

Interface ArchiveRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CassandraArchiveRepository, JarArchiveRepository, PathArchiveRepository

    public interface ArchiveRepository
    Interface to represent a persistence store for archives

      • getView

        RepositoryView getView(java.lang.String view)
        Get a specific named view into this repository.
        Parameters:
        view - the name of the view.
        Returns:
        a RepositoryView that matches the given name or null if one wasn't found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this repository does not support named views.

      • insertArchive

                 java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> initialDeploySpecs)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Insert a Jar into the repository
        Parameters:
        jarScriptArchive - script archive which describes the jar and the ModuleSpec which should be inserted
        initialDeploySpecs - a set of initial deployment specs.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if this repository does not support adding deploy specs to a module.
        java.io.IOException
